content: lion brand pattern # 50168 *cms-ponchette pdf* skill level intermediate a 620-099 wool-ease yarn fisherman 2 balls plus b c d e microspun article #910 4 colors 5 balls total plus f 320-098 fun fur yarn ivory 1 ball for drawstring crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm 2 large and 2 small wooden beads optional for drawstring gauge round 1 of motif = 2 \ 5 cm across motif = 4 \ 10 cm across on border single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet = 1¼ \ 3 cm 8 rounds = 4 \ 10 cm with 1 strand each of a and e held together both microspun and wool-ease yarns are held together while crocheting the motifs for this project ponchette is made of 28 motifs joined together while completing last round use 2 strands of specified colors held together throughout color assembly and construction schematics are provided
